professional_report.executive_summary:
UNIFIED INTELLIGENT DEFECT ANALYSIS REPORT
==========================================

SAMPLE: Unknown
ANALYSIS DATE: June 21, 2025 at 14:26 UTC
OVERALL STATUS: CONDITIONAL APPROVAL

QUALITY ASSESSMENT
------------------
Final Score: 70.0/100
Grade Classification: ACCEPTABLE
Defects Detected: 0
Affected Area: 0 pixels

EXECUTIVE DECISION
------------------
Material meets minimum standards but requires monitoring during use.

This automated analysis was performed using the Unified Intelligent Defect 
Analysis System v4.0, incorporating pixel-perfect defect detection, ASTM E-1932 
standards compliance verification, and advanced spatial quality assessment.
detailed_findings: DEFECT DETECTION: Identified 0 total defects using maximum recall detection

mitigation_strategies: Increase inspection frequency for this material type
Monitor performance in less critical applications first

recommendations: CONDITIONAL: Approve with increased inspection frequency
PROCESS REVIEW: Investigate minor quality variations

technical_specifications.detection_technology: Advanced Computer Vision with Maximum Recall
technical_specifications.processing_speed: Real-time analysis with sub-3 second processing
technical_specifications.confidence_thresholds: Adaptive thresholds based on defect classification confidence

detection_process: 1. Maximum Recall Detection - Ultra-sensitive defect identification
2. Pixel-Perfect Highlighting - Precise defect boundary determination
3. Intelligent Classification - AI-powered defect type identification
4. Standards Compliance - ASTM E-1932 verification against reference images
6. Risk Assessment - Comprehensive material usage evaluation
validation_criteria: Detection accuracy verified against known defect samples
ASTM compliance logic tested with standard materials
Grid analysis validated with reference specimens

standards_references.primary_standard: ASTM E-1932: Standard Guide for Assessing the Detectability of Discontinuities by Radiographic Testing
material_specifications: Carbon Steel: ASTM A36, ASTM A572
Stainless Steel: ASTM A240, ASTM A276
Alloy Steel: ASTM A514, ASTM A709
quality_grades: Grade A: Premium quality (≤2% defect tolerance)
Grade B: Standard quality (≤5% defect tolerance)
Grade C: Commercial quality (≤8% defect tolerance)
Grade D: Industrial quality (≤12% defect tolerance)
compliance_verification: Automated cross-reference with ASTM standard database
